articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: Expert hopes the rise in Covid-19 vaccinations means the US is waking up to the dangers of the Delta variant - CNN
articles.description: The Delta variant is wreaking havoc through much of the United States, but the "silver lining" is that more Americans appear to be at the tipping point of understanding the importance of Covid-19 vaccinations, one expert said.

articles.author: Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Some vaccinated Americans have lost their patience with those refusing the shot as Covid-19 cases surge and mandates return - WLS
articles.description: With Covid-19 cases and hospitalizations now surging again and officials across the US suddenly reimposing restrictions after a summer of semi normalcy, many vaccinated Americans are becoming increasingly angry at those who won't get vaccinated.
